title: Is there any way to see if you're banned?
body:
Sorry if this is the wrong place.

I tilted recently and now the league client is being super screwy with a randomly grey play button and not loading my profile, so in absence of anyone else having my problem I'm paranoid i'm banned.

replies.body:
Try to Log in.
when you find yourself posting on the forums that you have been banned and then e-mailing the Bot of customer service you will realize you are ban.  also in your e-mail box.
Restart client, might have been asking to update, I've had a grey play button before.
Log out and back in. It will give you a message saying you have been banned if you have been. You can also check your email, they send you one when you are punished.
